subject: Assaults
lead_paragraph: Mark Kerrigan, the brother of the figure skater Nancy Kerrigan, was indicted by a grand jury on a manslaughter charge in the death of their 70-year-old father.
snippet: Mark Kerrigan, the brother of the figure skater Nancy Kerrigan, was indicted by a grand jury on a manslaughter charge in the death of their 70-year-old father.
